snippet: The protest is an act of despair by the detainees, and the humane response is to end indefinite detention and close the prison.
abstract: Editorial maintains spreading hunger strike among prisoners at Guantanamo Bay prison exposes lawlessness of system that has subjected so many to despair of indefinite detention; calls upon Obama administration to free prisoners approved for release and close prison.
lead_paragraph: The protest is an act of despair by the detainees, and the humane response is to end indefinite detention and close the prison.
